description:
Replaces values in a text with some or all matches of a pattern replaced by a replacement.
The pattern can be a test or a regular expression.
If pattern is a text, only the first occurrence will be replaced.

input.name: pattern
input.description:
A text or a regular expression to be replaced.
Regular expressions must be wrapped with `/` character (e.g. `/.*/`).

input.name: replacement
input.description:
A text that replaces the substring specified by the specified `pattern` parameter.
 If unspecified, matches will be replaced with a blank text (i.e. `""`).

output.name: text
output.description: A new text with the replacement.
